website_summaries.verdict: Professional chef-quality paring knife with impressive steel construction.
pros: Very sharp, quality German steel blade
Triple-riveted full tang for precise control
Precision-forged from a single blank of high-carbon stainless steel
cons: Significantly more expensive than other options

customer_reviews.title: I wished I liked it more
customer_reviews.text: This is a review for the Wusthof WU4066/09 CLASSIC Paring Knife. Knives can be a personal thing. Some like thinner blades, some like sharper, some like duller, etc. I don't really like this knife. It's a well respected brand, but I don't like how it feels in my hand. I should have tried it in store more. And I don't like the thicker blade. I like the thinner blade on the Victorinox paring knife. It didn't come super sharp, but it hasn't really dulled much from when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pairing Knife
customer_reviews.text: I originally got a full set of Wusthof knives about 35 years ago and they still work great but I some how misplaced the 3.5 inch pairing knife so I ordered this as a replacement. After receiving this knife I didn't realize my other knives are as dull as they are, I had to order a knife sharpener to get them as sharp as the new pairing knife. The knives are great, I couldn't be happier with them.
customer_reviews.author: mward100

customer_reviews.title: Best 3.5 inch paring knife ever for veggies and fruits
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife. I am not a big believer in purchasing sets or expensive knifes. I have number of calaphalon 4.5 inch paring and 8 inch chef and even tried 3.5 inch paring knife of calaphalon. Calaphons were good but these are excellent. I am now a huge fan of forged knives by wusthof. All my future knives are going to be Wustof. It went through cucumber and even a bit ripe tomato like butter. The blades are super sharp. Combine that with maneuvering on a 3.5 inch. This is the best one I have ever used. I have tried calaphalon forged and henkels (sheet ones) and so on in the past, there is no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay

customer_reviews.title: Best paring knife I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this paring knife. My first knife disappeared about a month and a half ago and I could not wait to replace it. This knife has become my most used kitchen tool next to my 8-inch chef knife, and it was a true struggle to prep meals without my trusted paring knife. We eat a lot of vegetarian meals and so a good knife is essential in cooking for me with fresh veggies and herbs. You will not be disappointed in your purchase...unless someone throws it out with the potato peelings...keep an eye on it. Truly a GREAT knife!
customer_reviews.author: Browns Fan

customer_reviews.title: Get it before the price increases
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Classic, because I paid more for my EDC knife then any of my kitchen knives. So I informed by GF I was going to buy a good kitchen knife. Well as luck has it, I bought a fantastic kitchen knife and one I use almost everyday. The only thing missing is a sheath so I can take it camping with me. When I have guests over, this is the knife they select for cutting appetizers etc. Prior to this knife my kitchen stuff was mostly early American divorce quality. This sets a new benchmark for me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Eating Healthy
customer_reviews.text: Eating fruit as a dessert or snack involves more prep work than opening a bag of chips. This knife makes that prep work a pleasure. I love being able to easily peel, slice, and eat Kiwi with just this knife. I use it for everything, more than just fruit too. I slice my vegetables, summer sausage, cheeses, and of course fruit using this knife. After 5 months of daily use it's still sharp (without ever sharpening it). I cannot recommend a paring knife other than this one. In addition to great performance, the knife has a great feel in the hand. If you're considering this knife, go for it and be happy like me.
customer_reviews.author: theffx

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, but a tad small...
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, does what it is suppose to do. I wish I would have bought the 4 1/2 inch knife. This knife is a bit small, even for such small tasks as cutting an apple. I honestly don't know what I am going to use it for other than slicing olives.....but I can not give a bad review because I bought a knife that was too small for me. The price is a tad bit high for such a small knife. I have other Wusthof knifes and I love them...this one not so much...
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Paring Knife!
customer_reviews.text: I was using Wusthof steak knives to cut my stone fruit and lemons and such with good results, until my husband bought this paring knife. I have been missing out! This thing is SO sharp. It's shorter than my Wusthof steak knifes so there is a lot less chance of stabbing my other hand that's holding the fruit. It is light weight, the weight is all in the handle so it gives you great control of the blade. It slices through nectarines and cherries like butter, and lemons like it's.. well.. also butter. I should have purchased one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Claire T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kitchen tool that we use almost daily. The knife has a nice feel and stays sharp for a long time. It is somewhat expensive, but the quality makes it worth every penny. This knife should last a life time.
customer_reviews.author: My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Arrives real sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Well, this knife sure works: I cut my finger on it the first time I used it. LOL! Nothing major. In a strange way it may me feel good about my purchase. Feels good in the hand, really nice weight. The ideal paring knife.
customer_reviews.author: C Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife but short handle.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made and sharp knive but the handle is a little short. My hands are small so it works fine for me but I can’t recommend for people with larger hands.
customer_reviews.author: happyladi

customer_reviews.title: Superb knife
customer_reviews.text: The Wusthof 3 1/2 inch paring knife is absolutely superb. It is extremely well balanced and has good heft. The handle is a touch small, but it has not been an issue for my medium hand. Working with it is a pleasure, I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this. But as a reminder, it is very sharp and has an extremely sharp point; please be exceptionally careful when using this knife, it would be easy to get a deep cut, or remove a digit.
customer_reviews.author: thefarb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: If you are in the market for a paring knife and feel like spending a little extra for good quality then look no further than this knife. I purchased this as a gift and this person loves this knife! They use it almost every day and cutting seems to be a breeze instead of a chore. I can say I am thoroughly impressed with the quality of the knife and look forward to purchasing my own.
customer_reviews.author: A. Palmieri

customer_reviews.title: Like it - don't love it
customer_reviews.text: I read about this in the cooking magazine, Cooks Illustrated (best cooking mag ever) and they rated it very high for the money. There are other knives that cost two and three times this. But for the money it was rated as a 'best buy.' I wish it had a little more heft but I have to admit, it is very sharp. Holds its sharpness and does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality knife that is well made and a joy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little knife. I have designed knife grinding equipment and have become a bit of a knife blade snob. Quality is top notch, blade sharpen grind reveal is symmetrical and handle is well finished and is equally at home in my wife's hand as it is in mine.
customer_reviews.author: motion guru

customer_reviews.title: Love this little knife
customer_reviews.text: if you do a lot of prep work on vegetables, then invest in a good knife such as this. This seems to be about the right size for detailed work. I started using Cooks Illustrated recommendations about two years ago and glad I did. Otherwise, whatever I bought was kind of a guess. I'll emphasize that I may change my mind as time goes on (as with any product), but I don't see very much that could go wrong here that would change it much.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Longhair

customer_reviews.title: Made mother happy :)
customer_reviews.text: My mom lost 1 of the 2 of these knives she had in her original set so for christmas i decided to replace it for her. there is only a slight difference in shape/style from the older ones but it isn't very noticeable. the entire set she has i want to say is almost ten years old and the one parer she had left is still going strong as well as the rest of the set. great knives deserving of a great reputation. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great buy...
customer_reviews.text: Classic is classic,perfect size,weight and sharpness with durability that is unmatched...
customer_reviews.author: ozren panjevic

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this knife
customer_reviews.text: I love Wusthof knives. I had a whole set a few years ago, and after moving too many times lost many of my favorites. When my other brand paring knife broke, I ordered this one. It is super sharp and well made. I don't plan on moving for a long time so hopefully I can give it friends in the new future and collect a whole set soon.
customer_reviews.author: L. DeVoe

customer_reviews.title: great knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a great paring knife. The grip is very comfortable and it feels very balanced in my hand. I use a honing steel after each use to keep the blade sharp and it seems to work quite well. I will definitely be looking at Wusthof when I buy steak knives next.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Wusthof Classic 3-1/2 Inch Paring Knife
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Nice to have a sharp knife in the drawer! Been using the same knives for 28 years and when the wife used this for the first time, poked herself! Wasn't ready for the ease of going through the vegetables!! Now she loves it! Will add more of these to the collection! Stays sharp, easy to clean. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Geoff P

customer_reviews.title: Quality knife, staple for the knife block
customer_reviews.text: Go for quality and go for wustof. You will not regret it. The knife has nice balance and a good feel in the hand. Cuts very well. Don't expect to never sharpen it this gimmick knives are cheap. get yourself a hand sharpener and keep the knife honed for optimum results.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife - most used knife in my home.
customer_reviews.text: Great knife. Feels really good in the hand. I like the length, although some people think it's too short. For me, it works great. I have fairly small hands and I like the control I have with this knife. Would recommend to anyone and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Pinsonnault

customer_reviews.title: Very good knife
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and comfortable knife, Help to do delicate work in the citchen
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great paring knife
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife. She informed me that it is very happy with this knife, sharp out of the box and the perfect size. Time will tell the story as to how is stands up to constant use. So far a great product and a happy wife.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and versatility. Best brand for all around knifes.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Peirats

customer_reviews.title: This is a gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a requested Christmas gift. Requested because my daughter knows the quality of this product
customer_reviews.author: Cecily Gresham

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife. Very sharp, easy to hold, and cuts precisely. I was hesitant to get it because of the price but I think it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantham219

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time and pretty much sharpen it every time. Only gave it four stars because I'd like it to hold an edge better but OK for what I paid. Takes 15 seconds to sharpen.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Added to a set I have. You can always use additional paring knives. Sharp & clean cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Stocktongirl

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again without hesitation
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kitchen tool. Well worth the price. It has a full tang. It's well balanced in ones hand and holds an edge well. I liked the knife so much bcs it preformed so well that I went back and bought a second for our other vacation place.
customer_reviews.author: Y Symons

customer_reviews.title: Wusthof
customer_reviews.text: After all these years (I am now almost 80) I finally purchased a complete set of Wusthof knives and I cannot tell you how wonderful it is to now prepare meals with these beautiful utensils. My only wish is that I could have gone up a grade or two.
customer_reviews.author: rmilitello

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, stays sharp a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality knife at a good price. Wusthof Classic is worth every penny and is much better quality than their Gourmet line. I gave this as a gift to a family member who recently told me it's almost the only knife she uses. Take care of it and it will stay sharp a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Bears Fan

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen knives
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old knife that kids broke tip off of. Wusthof are the best kitchen knives I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: KMWY

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift. The price was better than others we compared to. The quality is superb and the shipping was fast! The person we bought it for was very pleased with it. We always buy this type of Wusthof knife as they have a long life and are very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A

customer_reviews.title: replacing lost Messermeister
customer_reviews.text: Lost the parer from my Messermeister set. Loved the M. Bought a cheap replacement. Then after a year or so got this. Just as good if not better than the Messermeister. Get good knives, they seem outrageously expensive. But you use them every day. worth it.
customer_reviews.author: HHIvy

customer_reviews.title: Well made knife. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a good paring knife. It is nice and sharp and fits well in the hand. It is versatile as it is good for not only making garnishes, but it also makes quick work of peeling fruits and vegetables. This is a well made knife.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre  and Joanne Franco

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of Wusthof Knives as part of my "make over" for kitchen utensils and dinnerware. ( getting to buy quality wares, not remodeling lol ) I was really excited to have nice high quality knives. I took careful preparation to get the Wusthof covers for my knives and sharpener. I hand washed them only and followed care instruction precisely. This small knife had the tip break off completely and the butcher knife is all chipped along the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Melonie

customer_reviews.title: I have learned to use and love my little paring knife
customer_reviews.text: After trying to slice fingers with the sharp blade, I have learned to use and love my little paring knife. I think I accidentally threw the old one away and am always in a panic if I don't find this one right away. What more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: C. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: good knife
customer_reviews.text: We really like this paring knife. It was very pricey, but made with good steel and has a very good edge.I am expecting it to do a good job for a very long time, if it doesn't get lost like my last one did.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bond

customer_reviews.title: We love it. Perfect size for small cutting jobs and ...
customer_reviews.text: Boy do we use this knife a lot! We love it. Perfect size for small cutting jobs and the blade is excellent quality. Very well-balanced and an integral part of our kitchen. I would love a whole set of these knives.
customer_reviews.author: ABQ_Music

customer_reviews.title: great little knife
customer_reviews.text: My wife just loves this little paring knife, and so do I. I'm going to get a four incher for myself. It fits the hand nicely, hones to a razor sharp edge, and gives you a feeling of confidence when you hold it. It's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: BobZoom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got for my father, a professionally trained cook, and he loves it! He's obsessed with the entire Wusthof line
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Cook's best friend
customer_reviews.text: Since ordering a replacement for my worn out paring knife, I have ordered this same knife for all our daughters and daughters-in-law... all seemed to like these little helpers as much as I do... very sharp, be careful... but a great help in the kitchen!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps a good sharp edge
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife. I use it all the time. If you have a good quality knife, you enjoy cooking with it. It keeps a good sharp edge a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: Woodie

customer_reviews.title: The difference between good enough and outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: Having already owned two of the larger Wustof Classic knives it wasn't a difficult decision to buy this one when the price came down to $29. After buying some hard beets at the farmers market I grabbed a knife from a good enough set, took one slice then remembered this new knife was in the drawer. The difference in slicing between a good enough knife and this one was the difference between good enough and outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: moth

customer_reviews.title: Very good paring knife
customer_reviews.text: These are very sharp paring knives. They fit my hand very nicely and I use them daily. Great little knife.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Briggs

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: The Wusthof knives are the best in my humble opinion. They are very well made and I would highly recommend any of their offerings. This particular knife is a great paring knife, but for overall usefulness I would recommend a 4-inch blade.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Wusthof Classic 3-1/2 Paring Knife
customer_reviews.text: Great paring knife! The feel in my hand in very good and secure. The knife pares so easily. I have used the knife to slice the skin off of rutabagas as well peeling an apple! I would recommend the knife.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Great paring knife. Comes razor sharp - I was able to shave hair off of my arm with it. Feels nice in hand, very light weight. Hand wash, dish washer not recommended and will wear off the Wusthof sticker emblem.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed !
customer_reviews.text: Very dull and can't keep its sharpness for long ! Do not even use it anymore !
customer_reviews.author: Eliane C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome precision blade
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife! The blade is so sharp it will cut almost anything. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hirth

customer_reviews.title: Very good additon to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: In the few weeks I've had this knife, it's become my go-to blade. Very sharp, it's held up to multiple uses with no apparent dulling of the blade, and it's comfortable to use. A very worthy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JimBob

customer_reviews.title: Cuts like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this paring knife. Pros: - Beautiful design. It's a classic, not much more can be said about that. - Comfortable handle - feels quality and sturdy. - Great for peeling even tough veggies and mincing Would recommend for anyone! I know it is a lot more expensive than other paring knifes out there, but you get what you pay for - this is an outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent knife, still using it, didn’t need to sharpen yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great little knives and well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great little knives and well worth the price. I had to buy a second, they're in constant use.
customer_reviews.author: cjlindem

customer_reviews.title: This is worth more than it's weight.
customer_reviews.text: A great paring knife is one of the most versatile tools in the kitchen: That being said, this knife is awesome. It came razor-sharp and retains the edge well. Without hesitation I would buy this knife again.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I gave this knife to my dad for fathers' day, and he seems very happy with it. In the few times I have used this knife, I have been very impressed. The blade is so sharp that it actually cut into one of our cutting boards! Overall, a very multi-functional, suberbly made knife.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bradford

customer_reviews.title: just love it. Great little gift for anyone who cooks
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a knife so much in the kitchen, for so many things... just love it. Great little gift for anyone who cooks, whether they love it, or just do it because they have to. Great price, too. Recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Vero519

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, but doesn't sharpen as well as I would like. Had higher expectations for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas DriscollTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a gift for my mom and she loved it
customer_reviews.text: My mom does not like big OR heavy knives but cooks daily so this was the perfect gift. She uses it to cut vegetables and has found it has taken well to her mechanical sharpener. Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ojus

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife.
customer_reviews.text: I used American test kitchens to help me decide on various knives. After learning buying "sets" is usually a waste and better to buy ala carte I took their advice on this paring knife. It is awesome! I grab it in the kitchen constantly. I bought a little wusthof cover for it for protection. I'm very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Denise Krackenberger

customer_reviews.title: The hype is true, it is awesome
customer_reviews.text: ABsolutely excellent little knife. I got it to replace and ancient Henckels. It is a far superior knife, which surprises me. But I love using it.
customer_reviews.author: 3rdCoastCC

customer_reviews.title: a fine knife
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, a nice knife, very sharp, lays well in my hand and the blade has a good size and shape. Using it makes cooking just a little more fun. And the price is not outrageous either.
customer_reviews.author: Nils Krumnack

customer_reviews.title: The Best Paring Knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little paring knife that is very well balanced and the proper length and weight. It has high quality steel that sharpens easily and holds an edge very well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice paring knife!
customer_reviews.text: We got this knife on a recommendation from the magazine Cook's Illustrated. We are quite happy with the purchase and cuts very well (unlike our previous paring knife). Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Bloom

customer_reviews.title: For pros
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a knife! Excellent balance and very sharp. This is quite different from the Wusthof 3" gourmet knife i also purchased and quite a bit more expensive but worth it. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: F. Tavares

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Knives are not all the same. Wusthof has EXCELLENT quality sturdy knives with good grip and high quality finishing.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Earth: I mean IT

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: An excellent paring knife- nice weight, comfortable handle, extremely sharp and maintaining edge. We both cook quite a bit and knives get well used and this one is holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: jimelt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I lost my paring knife and replaced it with this one. It's a great knife and sharpens like a dream. Much better than the competitor.
customer_reviews.author: B. Beals

customer_reviews.title: german knife quality but beware!
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp, quality craftsmanship. Nice balance for a tiny knife. I cut myself and it hurt. Used knife to cut the guaze in half. Sliced the guaze as easily as it sliced my thumb!
customer_reviews.author: RJ98

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife
customer_reviews.text: I love the Wusthof knife collection. These knives are so good when you first use them you're almost scared because they cut so good. Once you are used to using Wusthof you won't be able to go back to just any knife.
customer_reviews.author: jbordeno

customer_reviews.title: A good thing
customer_reviews.text: You simply cannot go wrong with buying a Wusthof knife. They will last a life time. I have learned to sharpen with a steel to keep them in good cutting order.
customer_reviews.author: Ceebeecee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, nice balance, I have other Wusthof knives and like the steel. You have to maintain them by honing and sharpening, but if you do that, these are good cutting tools.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V.

customer_reviews.title: I love the quality of Wusthof and will contnue to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift from my husband because we both always want to use the paring knife. I love the quality of Wusthof and will contnue to buy from them.
customer_reviews.author: JHW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Paring Knife
customer_reviews.text: This knife is exactly what you would expect for the price. It's easy to put a good edge on it, and it handles well. This would make a perfect graduation or wedding gift.
customer_reviews.author: Humanoid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality and a blade that can take a ...
customer_reviews.text: I initially felt a little silly paying $40 for a paring knife, but this will be the last paring knife you ever buy. Excellent build quality and a blade that can take a sharpening and retain a sharp edge for a long time. Feels very balanced in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: mikedeans

customer_reviews.title: Best paring knife I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: High quality that holds an edge and point. Best paring knife I've ever owned. Feels good in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Lugster

customer_reviews.title: Best in the world!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to rate the best made knives in the world. That being said, the knife is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bilay

customer_reviews.title: Wusthof Classic series knives are the best at this price
customer_reviews.text: Wusthof Classic knives are extremely well-made and are the best knives I have found at this price level. I always buy knives separately and never in sets.
customer_reviews.author: Paula G Cothren

customer_reviews.title: Can't imagine a better kitchen knife
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight and balance, super precise blade. The only downside...I now need to replace my other chef's knives with Wusthof Classics.
customer_reviews.author: LindaWoodkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent paring knife/
customer_reviews.text: Well made; handle contour is perfect for paring and blade stays sharp much longer than less expensive knives. Also, resharpening was easier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Genou Souriant

customer_reviews.title: beautiful knife
customer_reviews.text: Razor sharp! balanced. I love this paring knife! Finally caught the knife on sale and couldn't pass it up! The 4 1/2 inch paring knife and 6" utility knife I am going to work on next.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C.

customer_reviews.title: Great compliment to classic chef's knife
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Wusthof knife and is a perfect addition to my first (a Wusthof classic chef's knife). Sometime my 7 inch monster is overkill (think mincing garlic) and this knife is perfect for smaller jobs. Wusthof knives are a little more expensive but with proper care they last and last. If you have never had a good knife, you will be in for a real treat. Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: amy t

customer_reviews.title: Wusthof Classic paring knife
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp little knife, handy in the ktichen. Seems to stay sharper than my Ginsu knives.
customer_reviews.author: walterco-sd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: pricey but like they say ...Simple economics...you get what you pay for !
customer_reviews.author: mountainman716

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: excellent knife series, they are light and well balanced, I have twenty two knifes in this series so far and can't to buy wait more
customer_reviews.author: Satdvr45

customer_reviews.title: knife from amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Highly rated from cook illustrated so I decided to buy some quality knives. It's a working kitchen tool, what more can be said?
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Wusthof is oober-hof
customer_reviews.text: I mean, come on it is a Wusthof. What more do I need to say.
customer_reviews.author: H. W. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: My small selection of Wusthof knives changed my life in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a person who couldn't let go of the one in my kitchen. Once you have one it is really hard to imagine not having it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: If you only need one knife, this is the one.
customer_reviews.text: I cook a lot and since I've ordered this knife all the others are just picking up dust. It just the perfect size, weight, cutting etc..
customer_reviews.author: Antoine

customer_reviews.title: Just need a sliver, or precision cut? This knife can do it!
customer_reviews.text: This little knife will cut anything, like butter. I use it with my Fibrox 8-inch chef's knife, and it's all I need when cooking. Great addition to any chef's tool kit.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyJames

customer_reviews.title: this is a good investment if you plan to use your paring knife ...
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for. this is a good investment if you plan to use your paring knife frequently.
customer_reviews.author: benevolence

customer_reviews.title: Used it over and over and it holds a great edge. Razor sharp if I do my honing ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it over and over and it holds a great edge. Razor sharp if I do my honing correctly. Awesome knife
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Burkle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Knife.
customer_reviews.text: Good weight and handle. Blade is first rate. Yo can spend allot more on a knife but for our purposes this fits our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tinman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice size knife.
customer_reviews.text: Good size knife, I always go to this one first. I bought it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I cut myself three times the first time I used this knife. It is sharp. And it remains sharp. It is my favorite of many paring knives used over fifty years of preparing family meals. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: A. James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife and brand, very sharp and feels good in the hand
customer_reviews.author: birgit

customer_reviews.title: like they said ...
customer_reviews.text: an awesome little knife, exactly the shape, weight, balance and size I was hoping for. I really Love this knife.
customer_reviews.author: K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wusthof Classics 3-1/2 Inch Paring Knige
customer_reviews.text: I own this knife and purchased it as a gift for my daughter. She had asked for it and reports she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: LilyK

product_meta.title: Wusthof CLASSIC Paring Knife, One Size, Black, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Wusthof 3-1/2" Classic Paring KnifeThe Wusthof Classic 3-1/2" Paring Knife is the most versatile of all parers for your everyday carving needs. Perfect for mincing shallots onions and herbs as well as cleaning and cutting vegetables. The short curved blade with pointed tip is ideally suited for peeling and shaping. Forged from one piece of specially tempered high carbon stainless steel for exceptional strength.Standard Features:Classic Paring Knife Perfect for Mincing, Shallots Onions and Herbs Short Curved Blade Specially Tempered High Carbon Stainless Steel Blade Exceptionally Sharp and has a Long-Lasting Easily Restorable Edge Riveted Synthetic Handle is Smooth and Seamless for a Comfortable Grip Blade Length: 3-1/2" Carefully Hand Wash and Towel Dry Stain Resistant Alloy Quality - Made in Solingen/Germany Model #: 4066-7/9 240572
feature_bullets: Precision forged from a single blank of High Carbon Stainless Steel. Tempered to 58⁰ Rockwell
Full bolster and finger guard. Full tang that is triple riveted to the handle for precise control.
Precision Edge Technology (PEtec) yields a blade that is 20% sharper with twice the edge retention.

Comfortable and highly-durable polyoxymethylene (POM) handle with a traditional look and feel, stickered with our red Trident logo. The most versatile of all parers: for mincing shallots, onions and herbs as well as cleaning and cutting vegetables
